name: Tabs, Enlarge list-all-tabs button  (DM*)
description:
Enlarging the tabs drop-down button and making it standout was created by request as a concept. Because of the smaller icon images in the list-all-tabs and close-button this style has been very useful to me as well. One can easily customize the background color. ★ Recommended Companion Styles can be found in the Notes of style 101569 (101569).
